programme.desc: After moving to Seattle, Frasier (Kelsey Grammer) decides to have his father (John Mahoney) move in with him. With David Hyde Pierce.

programme.desc: A professional golfer suffers a series of setbacks and returns home to Budapest to reevaluate her future. While there, a golf pro helps her rediscover herself and find love.

programme.desc: Sparks fly between an interior designer and a handsome pilot who finds homes for rescue dogs.
